name: Slots Play365
description:
Slots Play365 Casino is now open! Get yourself carried away by the gold fever, and let the nuggets roll!

Flaunting its professional style, Slots Play365 will transport you into the real Slots Casino experience. Analyze your chances, choose the right line combination and spin your luck. Place your bets and get ready to get big rewards. Prepare your amulets and your lucky charms, because luck is the dealer.

Become a slot professional and unlock lots of thematic slot machines. Each slot has unique characteristics, special bonus games, and insane rewards. Wild Cards and Scatter shots are also floating around, so the action is ensured.

Slots Play365 features:
- User friendly In-Game store.
- Lots of thematic Slot Machines and more slots coming soon.
- Bonus Coins every 4 hours.
- Facebook integrated APP with helpful rewards.
- Las Vegas gambling atmosphere.
- Original mini games in each slot machine.
- Different multiple line connectors.
- High quality graphics and sounds.
